oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Disbursements
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mardi Gras; finance;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: List of "Disbursements": shows payment to Nonnon, Paris customer, of $3500 in gold; lists costs of shipping costumes and Custom House duties; payment of $500 to artist Carl Gutherz; various other listings including $266.50 for "rice-negroes"; written in pencil; on verso list of payments made on 3/13, 3/21, and 4/17.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by John Jones
